tool.name: Filter FASTA by Length

param.name: min_length
param.label: Minimal length of the return sequence

param.name: max_length
param.label: Maximal length of the return sequence

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**TIP**. If only want to show sequences longer than a threshold, set *minimal length* to the threshold and leave *maximal length* to zero.
-----
**What it does**
This tool accepts two parameters: *minimal length* and *maximal length*, and returns sequences of length within the two thresholds.
-----
**Example**
- assume the input file contains fasta sequences::
>seq1 TCATTTAATGAC >seq2 ATGGC >seq3 TCACATGATGCCG >seq4 ATGGAAGC
- return sequences with length longer than 10bp (set the *minimal length* to 10, and the *maximal length* to 0 (no limitation))::
>seq1 TCATTTAATGAC >seq3 TCACATGATGCCG
